players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked by Alice's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together to figure out what happened and ensure the safety of our town."

Charlie: "I agree with Diana. We must work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death and ensure the safety of our town. Let us remain vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and statements during this crucial time."
You: "I am also shocked by Alice's death. We should look closely at everyone's statements for inconsistencies."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we may have that could help us understand what happened to Alice. Let's be open and honest with each other, as trust is crucial in our efforts to uncover the truth and keep our town safe."
Diana: "I remember Alice mentioning that she had received a threatening note before her death. We should all share if we've received any suspicious messages or noticed anything unusual."
You: "I haven't received any threats, but I'm concerned about why Alice would mention a note to only one person. Diana, did you witness this note yourself?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked by Alice's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together to figure out what happened and ensure the safety of our town."

You: "I agree with Diana. We must work together to uncover the truth behind Alice's death and ensure the safety of our town. Let us remain vigilant and pay close attention to each other's actions and statements during this crucial time."
Bob: "I am also shocked by Alice's death. We should look closely at everyone's statements for inconsistencies."

You: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we may have that could help us understand what happened to Alice. Let's be open and honest with each other, as trust is crucial in our efforts to uncover the truth and keep our town safe."
Diana: "I remember Alice mentioning that she had received a threatening note before her death. We should all share if we've received any suspicious messages or noticed anything unusual."
Bob: "I haven't received any threats, but I'm concerned about why Alice would mention a note to only one person. Diana, did you witness this note yourself?"
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
